build.buildCommand: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter @breakagency/shared build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/web build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api build && echo 'Build completed successfully'

deploy.startCommand: cd apps/api && NODE_ENV=production npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && echo 'Migrations completed' && node dist/server.js
